DOC.HEADLINE: COSTA MESA FIRM OFFERS QUAKE AID
DOC.TEXT: Strategic Mortgage Services , which is providing inspection work to earthquake victims at cost , said Wednesday that it also will assist home mortgage lenders hurt by the Jan . 17 Northridge quake by offering them free use of its operations center for the next two months . SMS , which offers a variety of mortgage services nationwide , said the offer is open_to residential mortgage lenders who suffered earthquake damage or losses to their own document processing operations . The SMS facility , which is in Orange , will have computers and processing services available from 6:30 a.m. to midnight . Since Jan . 25 when it first offered its inspection services at its cost -- from $ 25 to $ 50 -- SMS has conducted more_than 500 inspections of homes damaged by the earthquake , said Chris Nard , the company ' s vice_president for marketing .
